PERSONA:
meet robert, a 55-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. he was born and raised in the u.s. and is a high school graduate with no further formal education. robert is a devout roman catholic, attending religious services a few times a year, though he does not identify as a born-again or evangelical christian.

politically, robert considers himself an independent voter, but he leans towards the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative views. despite his lower income bracket of less than $30,000 per year, he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously.

in his personal life, robert is married and comes from a white non-hispanic background. he is a frequent internet user, accessing it several times a day, but he does not actively engage in volunteerism activities.

overall, robert is a middle-aged, moderate-leaning catholic man from the south atlantic region, navigating life with his high school education and lower income while staying involved in the political process and maintaining his religious beliefs.
